queue_configs.message: <break time="500ms"/> We are currently closed. In observance of New Year's Day, we have reduced holiday hours to 9:00am to 3:30pm Central Time.  You can also try us back during our normal business hours of 7:00AM to 10:00PM Central Time, Monday through Friday, and 7:00AM to 8:00PM Central Time, Saturday and Sunday. We apologize for this inconvenience and look forward to speaking with you soon.
